nodes.text: Bobe Ojgrib was a male Twi'lek who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Ojgrib worked as an assistant to Senator Lavina Durada-Vashne Wren, on the floating city of Chola Mavra, on Genarius. When the heroes of Cularin traveled to Chola Mavra in about 32 BBY, Ojgrib escorted them to where Senator Wren was waiting to meet them. Afterward, Ojgrib escorted the heroes back to their ship.
